title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.30 - Retention of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.30 - Retention of records

State Regulations

All records required pursuant to this Part to be made
available to the commissioner shall be retained by the milk dealer for a period
of three years to begin at the end of the month to which such records pertain. If, within the three-year period the commissioner notifies the milk dealer in
writing that further retention of such records is necessary, the milk dealer
shall retain the specified records until further written notification is
received from the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
